resources.string: 2) Enter an Email name and a password with at least 1 uppercase letter, 1 lowercase letter, 1 number, and 1 symbol
1) Click on the button to add a new player.
2) Click on the oblect in the database to update it.
3) Click on the delete button to remove the object.

Welcome to Movie Information app! 

Simply enter the movie name you wish to search for in order to get the movies under that name and information about the movie you want. 

If you wish to see details, just add one movie of your choice to your library, and you can have access to it after you click the + sign at the top!

This page stores all your saved movies. 

If you wish to see details about a movie you have saved, you can see by clicking on the movie. 

If you wish to delete a movie, click on the movie, come back to this page, and click on the garbage icon, choose whether you want to delete or not.
